_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

TransportProgressStatus.description: A document sent from a Transportation Network Manager to a Transport Service Provider giving the status of the whereabouts and schedule of the transport means involved in a transport service.

TransportProgressStatus.title: Transport Progress Status. Details
TransportProgressStatus.description: A document sent from a Transportation Network Manager to a Transport Service Provider giving the status of the whereabouts and schedule of the transport means involved in a transport service.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Transport Progress Status. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Transport Progress Status. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Transport Progress Status. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Transport Progress Status. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Transport Progress Status. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Transport Progress Status. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Transport Progress Status. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Transport Progress Status. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Transport Progress Status. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Transport Progress Status. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

StatusAvailableIndicator.title: Transport Progress Status. Status Available_ Indicator. Indicator
StatusAvailableIndicator.description: Indicates whether transport progress information is available.

Signature.title: Transport Progress Status. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

SenderParty.title: Transport Progress Status. Sender_ Party. Party
SenderParty.description: The party sending the Transport Progress Status.

ReceiverParty.title: Transport Progress Status. Receiver_ Party. Party
ReceiverParty.description: The party receiving the Transport Progress Status.

SourceIssuerParty.title: Transport Progress Status. Source Issuer_ Party. Party
SourceIssuerParty.description: The party that is the source of the Transport Progress Status.

TransportProgressStatusRequestDocumentRe.title: Transport Progress Status. Transport Progress Status Request_ Document Reference. Document Reference
TransportProgressStatusRequestDocumentRe.description: A reference to the Transport Progress Status Request document to which this status report is a response.

TransportMeans.title: Transport Progress Status. Transport Means
TransportMeans.description: The transport means by which the current transport service is effectuated.

TransportSchedule.title: Transport Progress Status. Transport Schedule
TransportSchedule.description: Describes the status and schedule of the transport means operating the transport service as well as the current location of the transport means.
